title: How to export pytorch to ONNX alternative forward path
body_html:
If i understand correctly using torch.onnx.export (@ezyang ) uses jit trace module in order to dump forward pathand then it converts to onnx.
Anyone has a suggestion on how to convert/trace for different path (In my example i need incremental_forward of wavenet model from https://github.com/r9y9/wavenet_vocoder/blob/master/wavenet_vocoder/wavenet.py line 236)?

body:
If i understand correctly using torch.onnx.export (@ezyang ) uses jit trace module in order to dump forward pathand then it converts to onnx.
Anyone has a suggestion on how to convert/trace for different path (In my example i need incremental_forward of wavenet model from https://github.com/r9y9/wavenet_vocoder/blob/master/wavenet_vocoder/wavenet.py line 236)?
